title: Astra Space, Vonage, Rivian, Zoom Video: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Ericsson said it would acquire Vonage; Zoom results are due after the close
body:
Futures are up ahead of data on the property market and a decision on the next leader of the Federal Reserve. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
